thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: jeffrey poe
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by jeffrey poe

author: jeffrey poe
title: jeffrey poe
text: I wanted to purchase binoculars for my sister. After a lot of research I decided that Eagle Optics Denali 8x42s were the best bang for my buck. I was not disappointed. The quality seems very good and they were shipped and delivered very quickly. Plus they have an excellent warranty.
